nodes.bodyText:
Is there a good reason to make this new callback type here instead of using a Task<CrashlyticsReport>?
It seems like this is the perfect use case for a Promise -- a result or error that gets resolved at most once.
I'd originally written this to map to the underlying callback, but I'll take another look. I think you're right.

Okay, talked about this in person - going to hold off on this for now, but may move the loop up a level and have a sendReport method that returns a single Task. Will revisit after all the "thin thread" changes are in.
